price: 78. En waarlijk! Mijn vloek is over jou tot de Dag der Vergelding.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
